title: Battlecast team for run
body:
Looking to join or create a ranked team (start in normals until we can sort our strategies) for battlecast only champs.

Can fill near any role.  Preference is 
Viktor, xerath, cho, kogmaw and currently learning skarner, urgot and velkoz

replies.body:
Still looking for more players... 

Mid lakers needed but any role will work for backups.

Will invite you guys tonight.

Still looking for a velkoz main. With knowledge on xerath for support.

A skarner main would be nice as well

i can do velkoz
velkoz is my main
I have Creator viktor and Battlecast Urgot and would love to join!
I have battlecast cho, but i dont play him much, and i got the skin from riot, but am willing to learn
I have battlecast cho, but i dont play him much and got a skin from riot
